description:
Thanks for app
Please add a Proxy option to settings.
summary: Nice Looking, but yet low options

description: App opens with a window of various YT videos. You can not sign into your Google account to watch content you want to see. Yes, there is a search button but it seems to be kind of useless. There is no way to filter any of the content. App is disappointing because I was expecting to at the very least have a way to search for specific type of videos. App is a good idea but needs a lot of work. Not ready for public use.

I'm using Linux Lite 5.8 and once I installed this app, it looked like it was trying to launch but it didn't. Maybe had I done a reboot it might have but I didn't have time to fiddle with it.

Oh well, I was hopeful it would work. Thanks anyway.
would be great if there were subscribtion options
summary: great app when features are there

description: It looks like GTK but doesn't integrate at all. Seems like this is very useful for downloading from YouTube, but there are other lighter programs for that. I'd love a GTK YouTube desktop client that can replace the website, but this needs work.

In Desktop Mode:
- launches, but only has a close button. You have to double click the titie bar to go full screen (minor issue).
- Once you select a video you cannot play a video, or launch it with a third party player directly. You have to download the videos (deal breaker)

In Gaming Mode:
- App launches to black screen. Can't interact, wont load (deal breaker)
cant read anything because I dont know what kind of language is set up here. Not readable in Europe. Sorry. Please fix.
